R

restartDeadline(long) - Method in class com.iardelian.revives.model.ReviveServiceController.Builder
Restart service after this time even if other requirements are not met.
restartDelay(long) - Method in class com.iardelian.revives.model.ReviveServiceController.Builder
Restart service delay.
RestartJobHelper - Class in com.iardelian.revives.manager
This class used to set periodic messages sending to StartupBroadcastReceiver with delay that is sets up in ReviveServiceManager.getCheckingRestartTimeMs()
RestartJobHelper() - Constructor for class com.iardelian.revives.manager.RestartJobHelper
 
RestartJobService - Class in com.iardelian.revives.service
Entry point for the callback from the JobScheduler.
RestartJobService() - Constructor for class com.iardelian.revives.service.RestartJobService
 
restartWhenDeviceInUse(boolean) - Method in class com.iardelian.revives.model.ReviveServiceController.Builder
Restart when device in use.
ReviveService - Class in com.iardelian.revives.service
Main service class.
ReviveService() - Constructor for class com.iardelian.revives.service.ReviveService
 
ReviveServiceController - Class in com.iardelian.revives.model
This class provides container of data passed to the JobScheduler to set conditions in in which service need to be restarted after it was stopped
ReviveServiceController.Builder - Class in com.iardelian.revives.model
Builder class for ReviveServiceController objects.
ReviveServiceManager - Class in com.iardelian.revives.manager
Main managing class.
ReviveServiceNotifier - Interface in com.iardelian.revives
This interface is implemented by user to get information about start and stop the service
reviveServiceStarted() - Method in interface com.iardelian.revives.ReviveServiceNotifier
Service was started.
reviveServiceStopped() - Method in interface com.iardelian.revives.ReviveServiceNotifier
Service was stopped.
